Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 10 Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika » 10.4 Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika » 10.4.1 Kusalākusalapada » 10.4.1.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetu
Mahantaraduka, Kusalattika
Cittasampayuttaduka, Kusalattika
Kusalākusalapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
29.
2073Cittasampayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
30.
2074Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2075(Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
31.
2076Cittasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca cittasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
32.
2077Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) (Sahajātavārepi…pe…  pañhāvārepi sabbattha ekaṃ.)
